name: npm-dependency-stats
description: Offline collection of the dependents and devDependents of every package in the npm registry.

scripts.compress: tar cfzv dependents.tgz dependents && tar cfzv devDependents.tgz devDependents
scripts.decompress: tar xfzv dependents.tgz && tar xfzv devDependents.tgz

author: Zeke Sikelianos <zeke@sikelianos.com> (http://zeke.sikelianos.com)
